extendedInfo.description: Get more than 500+ cool facts on your mobile to share with your friends. Add the ones that you like to your favorite list to view them later. Share the ones that you like with friends through message, email, facebook, twitter etc.

reviews.comment:
Pretty cool
Favourites can't be seen if text is too long

Needs more facts also some are the same but re worded
Then ill give a higher star rating
reviews.author: A Google User
